div.pre: 1996 Pisticci, 24 km. W of Metaponto, Lucania, 1934 Burial: c. 235 B.C. Contents: 31 AR, 1 AE. In metal container Taras: 28 st. (27 Per. VIII; 1 Per. IX) 1 dr. Heracleia: 1 dr. Metapontum: 1 dr. (obv. owl) 1 AE Disposition: Reggio Procopio, AIIN 1954, pp. 49-52 Crawford 93 containing in addition 1 half- quad., 1 vict., and 3 quin. may be part of this hd.; if so, the date of burial will have to be brought down to the end of the cent.
